name: swagger-diff
description: A build/release task for comparing two OpenAPI (v3) or Swagger (v2) REST Contracts.
helpMarkdown:
### Compare two Contracts - left-side and right-side.
Contracts can be either OpenAPI (v3) or Swagger (v2).
author: duy

inputs.name: swaggerVersion
inputs.label: Contract Version:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Which version of contract schema is being used

inputs.name: webhookUrl
inputs.label: Webhook Url:
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of the webhook. We use to send the breaking changes notification

inputs.name: leftType
inputs.label: Left Contract Type:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether the left-side contract is a file path or Url.

inputs.name: leftFilePath
inputs.label: Left Contract File Path:
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path of the left-side contract.

inputs.name: leftUrl
inputs.label: Left Contract Url:
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of the left-side contract.

inputs.name: rightType
inputs.label: Right Contract Type:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether the right-side contract is a file path or Url.

inputs.name: rightFilePath
inputs.label: Right Contract File Path:
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path of the right-side contract.

inputs.name: rightUrl
inputs.label: Right Contract Url:
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of the right-side contract.
